nodes.text: A large battle group of the Galactic Empire served within the Imperial Navy around the time of the Battle of Yavin. The Assertor-class Star Dreadnought Wrath served as the flagship of the battle group, and although its exact composition was not known, it was assumed that it consisted of dozens of other starships including smaller dreadnoughts, Imperial I-class Star Destroyers, Imperial II-class Star Destroyers, various cruiser-sized vessels, and numerous support ships.
The battle group operated in the border between the Mid Rim and Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy to provide support for anti-Alliance operations.
